971916688273809408.text: Come build the future with us!https://l4.ventures/jobs

971916687225188352.text: As a member of the investment team you can work on @stablefund - a $45 million fund working to increase adoption of Dai, a stable cryptocurrency to replace the US dollar.

971916686273081344.text: As an engineer / researcher you can work on https://counterfactual.com  – a scaling solution that will allow decentralized applications to be usable by regular people. Imagine working on TCP/IP in the early days of the internet — this is similar in scale and opportunity.

971916685497188352.text: ,@L4ventures is at the forefront of two key pieces of blockchain infrastructure: scalability and volatility of cryptocurrencies. We’re looking for engineers, researchers, and investment associates/partners to move faster.
